propertyDocs.name: componentModel
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Component model for this template

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Description of this template

propertyDocs.name: wizard
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Wizard component for this template.

propertyDocs.name: title
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Title for this template.

xcd.component.ComponentTemplate.classDescription: A template model to create components of a certain type within the code editor.

propertyDocs.name: discard
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: True if the transition discards user input, e.g. a "Cancel" transition.

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Description of the transition.

propertyDocs.name: action
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Action(s) to execute for this transition.

propertyDocs.name: to
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Target state for this transition.

propertyDocs.name: defaultPrecision
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Return the default precision for this application (0 = unlimited which is also the default). Beware that leaving this default is bound to be the slowest solution if the numeric property is finally backed by a database.

this is not part of the bignumber.js configuration

propertyDocs.name: MODULO_MODE
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
null
Values: ROUND_UP, ROUND_DOWN, ROUND_FLOOR, ROUND_HALF_EVEN, EUCLID

propertyDocs.name: ROUNDING_MODE
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
null
Values: ROUND_UP, ROUND_DOWN, ROUND_CEIL, ROUND_FLOOR, ROUND_HALF_UP, ROUND_HALF_DOWN, ROUND_HALF_EVEN, ROUND_HALF_CEIL

xcd.config.DecimalConfig.classDescription:
Encapsulates the global decimal configuration. The JSON representation is compatible with the bignumber.js library, but note that we are using "ROUND_DOWN" or "ROUND_HALF_EVEN" strings instead of the normal numeric values / BigNumber.ENUM_VAR configuration.

Bignumber.js config documentation

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the property.

propertyDocs.name: type
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Logical property type for this property.

propertyDocs.name: typeParam
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Type parameter for the property. Set for List, Map, Enum.

propertyDocs.name: required
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Set true if this property is required.

propertyDocs.name: maxLength
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Maximum length for this property if applicable.

propertyDocs.name: defaultValue
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Default value for this property.

propertyDocs.name: data
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: User data field. Not used by the system.

propertyDocs.name: foreignKey
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Foreign key definition for this property.

propertyDocs.name: root
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Layout root component. When a view uses a layout, its root content gets replaced by the layout root content. The view starts rendering starts with the "root" content. At the position of each <Content/> component within, the corresponding content block from the view will be rendered.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

propertyDocs.name: context
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Context model for the layout. The layout context is special in that it is a prototypic context. Each property
      defined here will exists in every view the layout is used in without any connection between them.

xcd.view.LayoutModel.classDescription:
Reusable top level layout definition model. The default layout for the application is defined in the application model.
  Views can override the default by providing a layout prop to their root View component.

propertyDocs.name: data
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Returns arbitrary user data associated with this query type model. Can be used by alternate storage configuration
      for a query type.

propertyDocs.name: query
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the SQL query for this query type model.

propertyDocs.name: sqlQueryFactory
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Returns a class name of a org.springframework.jdbc.object.SqlQuery implementation used for
      querying the results of this query type model.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

xcd.domain.type.QueryTypeModel.classDescription: A domain type based on an SQL query.

propertyDocs.name: pkFields
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: List of properties that form the primary key for this type.

propertyDocs.name: storage
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Configures the storage configuration to use for this domain type. Default is "jooqDatabaseStorage".

propertyDocs.name: properties
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: List of properties for this domain type.

xcd.domain.type.DomainTypeModel.classDescription:
Represents an domain entity type within an exceed application.
 
  The persistent JSON output for this model generated by  {@link de.quinscape.exceed.runtime.model.ModelJSONServiceImpl#toJSON(Object)}.

propertyDocs.name: transitions
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Transitions for this view state.

xcd.process.ViewState.classDescription: A view state within a process. Corresponds with a process view model.

propertyDocs.name: templates
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Template models for this component

propertyDocs.name: queryTransformer
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Bean name of a de.quinscape.exceed.runtime.expression.query.QueryTransformer implementation
      (Default is "componentQueryTransformer")

propertyDocs.name: classes
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Component classification for this component. The classes are used to determine eligibility for completion or to activate view renderer features.

The class "model-aware" will cause the model and viewModel to be injected into the component.

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Description for the component.

propertyDocs.name: childRule
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Completion rule to find all eligible children for this component. The general mechanism is to find all child candidates
      with this rule and then use a potential parentRule on the child to validate the candidate status.

propertyDocs.name: componentPropWizards
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Maps the prop name to the a component prop wizard definition for that prop.

propertyDocs.name: queries
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Query definitions for this component. The result of the query will show up in the component data block under
      the defined query name.

propertyDocs.name: parentRule
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Validation rule to validate if a component is valid in a parent context.
     
      @see #childRule

propertyDocs.name: providesContext
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Defines the symbolic type name of the context provided by this component. Other components can receive that component type either
      by inheriting it from the first parent to offer any context or by specifying a context type they depend on.

propertyDocs.name: propTypes
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Maps prop names to PropDeclarations for this component.

propertyDocs.name: vars
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Var definitions for this component

propertyDocs.name: dataProvider
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Name of spring bean implementing the DataProvider interface to use as an alternate data provider to use for this component.
      The default is to use QueryDataProvider.

propertyDocs.name: defaultLength
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Default length for this property type.

propertyDocs.name: converter
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the class name of either a PropertyConverter or PropertyConverterFactory implementation.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

xcd.domain.property.PropertyTypeModel.classDescription: THe logical property types within the application.

propertyDocs.name: message
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Message expression for this confirmation.

propertyDocs.name: okLabel
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
OK-label expression for this confirmation. It is good UI practice to label confirmations with the actual operation
      being done instead of just "Ok"

propertyDocs.name: components
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the a map mapping component names to the component descriptors for that component.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Description for the component package.

xcd.component.ComponentPackageDescriptor.classDescription:
Contains component descriptions for all components in a component package directory. It is the result of parsing a "components.json" file.

The package descriptor differs from the other top level models in that it is not subject to composition by the ModelCompositionService but is handled by ComponentRegistryImpl.

It describes component

propertyDocs.name: title
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Title for the prop wizard component

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Description for the prop wizard

propertyDocs.name: wizard
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Wizard Component js name.

xcd.component.ComponentPropWizard.classDescription: A wizard component definition for the component.

propertyDocs.name: properties
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: List of properties for this context.

xcd.context.ContextModel.classDescription: Model for a scoped context (e.g. application context, session context, process context etc).

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

xcd.domain.DomainRule.classDescription: Declares a reusable and composable domain rule.

xcd.process.DecisionState.classDescription:
A decision state within a process,

A series of decisions is considered in definition order, each having an expression attribute taking a value expression and a transition to execute in case that expression evaluates to true.

If none of the decision transitions is taken, the default transition is used.

propertyDocs.name: disabled
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: true if the mapping is currently disabled.

propertyDocs.name: viewName
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: The view name mapped to this location. Mutually exclusive with processName.

propertyDocs.name: processName
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: The process name mapped to this location. Mutually exclusive with viewName.

propertyDocs.name: groupSize
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the primary grouping size of the integer part. If 0, grouping of the integer part will be disabled.

propertyDocs.name: secondaryGroupSize
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the secondary grouping size of the integer part

propertyDocs.name: groupSeparator
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the grouping separator of the integer part.

propertyDocs.name: decimalSeparator
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the decimal separator between integer part and fractional part.

propertyDocs.name: fractionGroupSeparator
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the grouping separator of the fraction groups.

propertyDocs.name: schema
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Database schema for this application

propertyDocs.name: sessionContext
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: The session context model. Each property in it will exist once per user session.

propertyDocs.name: supportedLocales
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Array of normalized locale specifications to support for this application.

propertyDocs.name: applicationContext
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: The application context for this application. Each property will exist once per application.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

propertyDocs.name: defaultLayout
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns the default layout for this application.

propertyDocs.name: styleSheets
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Stylesheets resource paths for this application

xcd.config.ApplicationConfig.classDescription: Encapsulates general application configuration. Corresponds to the "/models/config.json" resource.

propertyDocs.name: startState
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Sets the start state for this state machine.
     
      @param startState    start state

propertyDocs.name: states
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Sets the map of all states to valid state names to transition to.
     
      @param states map of all states

xcd.state.StateMachine.classDescription:
Simple finite state machine implementation that is basically a structured enum type.

Each state machine has a number of states and each state a number of valid transitions to other state.

propertyDocs.name: startTransition
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Transition be executed when the process is entered.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

propertyDocs.name: context
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Process context. Each property in it will exist once per execution of the process. The server remembers past
      process contexts to continue work at this point when the user returns to another view with browser history
      navigation.

propertyDocs.name: states
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Process states of the process.

propertyDocs.name: private
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Returns true if the scope property is supposed to be private, that is it is only visible inside the process. It is not accepting input from the outside / a parent process nor is it accessible as sub process output.

propertyDocs.name: defaultValue
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: The default value expression for this scoped property.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
The name of the scoped property. Must be unique for all scope locations, i.e. within the combination of all
      applicable scopes the each context.

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Description of this scoped property

propertyDocs.name: typeParam
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Property type specific type parameter:
  • For the simple property types, this is null,
  • For the DomainType type this is the name of the property type.
  • For the Map and List types the type param is either a domain type name or a property type name.

propertyDocs.name: type
maxLength
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: For PlainText and RichText type, this defines the maximum number of characters. If it is less or equal to 0, the property is unbounded.

xcd.context.ScopedPropertyModel.classDescription: A single scoped property value within a scope.

propertyDocs.name: values
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: String values for this enum

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Description for the enum type.

propertyDocs.name: domainType
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Domain type of the "current" reference in this view. @param domainType

propertyDocs.name: title
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Title of this view. Can be either a normal string attribute or an expression.

propertyDocs.name: content
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Returns the complete content map of this view. The default content is called "main". The "root" content will imported
      from the layout, by default it just imports the "main" slot.

propertyDocs.name: layout
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Layout to use for this view. If not set, the application default layout will be used.

propertyDocs.name: context
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
The view context model. Each property in it will exist within the view. Note that additional properties might
      be added from the layout used.

xcd.view.View.classDescription:
Represents a view model within an exceed application
 
  The persistent JSON output for this model generated by  {@link de.quinscape.exceed.runtime.model.ClientViewJSONGenerator#toJSON(de.quinscape.exceed.model.ApplicationModel, View, JSONFormat)}  }.

propertyDocs.name: property
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Target property name. Default is id,

propertyDocs.name: type
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Target domain type name

xcd.domain.property.ForeignKeyDefinition.classDescription:
Domain foreign key definition.
 
  Note that not all StorageConfiguration might support foreign keys.

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Name of the top level model.

propertyDocs.name: mappings
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
The mappings for this routing table. Maps a route template string with potential
      place holders to a mapping model.

propertyDocs.name: defaultValue
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Default value for this prop.

propertyDocs.name: contextType
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Type of context this prop declaration is dependent on.

propertyDocs.name: rule
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Completion rule for this prop. Wizard dialogs can be specified by setting ComponentDescriptor#componentPropWizards

propertyDocs.name: description
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Prop declaration description for autocomplete purposes.

propertyDocs.name: client
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: true if this prop is visible to the client as a value. Some props are only needed for server operation and / or might contain expression types not available on the client per-se. Setting this to false will cause such an attribute to be only added as a comment.

propertyDocs.name: type
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Proptype for for this prop.
Values: PLAINTEXT, INTEGER, FLOAT, BOOLEAN, MAP, CLASSES, GLYPH_ICON, TRANSITION, FIELD_REFERENCE, DOMAIN_TYPE_REFERENCE, QUERY_EXPRESSION, CURSOR_EXPRESSION, FILTER_EXPRESSION, VALUE_EXPRESSION, ACTION_EXPRESSION, CONTEXT_EXPRESSION

propertyDocs.name: required
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: true if the prop is required for the component.

xcd.component.PropDeclaration.classDescription: Declaration for a single property within a {@link ComponentDescriptor}.

xcd.config.ComponentConfig.classDescription:
Contains component configurations for the components within an exceed applications. Is embedded in {@link ApplicationConfig}

This is were app-level configuration for components is stored. Is provided

propertyDocs.name: name
propertyDocs.propertyDescription:
Component name. Following react conventions, all components with uppercase names are exceed components and
      all components with lowercase names are normal HTML tags.

propertyDocs.name: attrs
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: Map of attribute values "value" or expressions "{ expr() }".

propertyDocs.name: kids
propertyDocs.propertyDescription: List of children of this component model.

xcd.view.ComponentModel.classDescription:
A view component within an exceed application. Following the react conventions, it is a full-fledged Javascript react
  component when its name is uppercase and a simple HTML tag if its name is lowercase.

popCursor.name: popCursor
popCursor.description: Shortens the path of a cursor by n levels, returning the cursor location to a parent or grandparent of the current location.

transitionModel.name: transitionModel
transitionModel.description: The transition model for the given name

navigateTo.name: navigateTo
navigateTo.description: AJAX Navigation action within an exceed application. To be used in views without process.

syslog.name: syslog
syslog.description: System log function. Server logs per slf4j, client to the console API

error.name: error
error.description: An action that executes the given transition

when.name: when
when.description: A conditional branch in the action promise chain

uuid.name: uuid
uuid.description: Creates a new UUID type 4 value

cast.name: cast
cast.description: Casts a value to another type if possible. Useful to e.g. convert one Enum to another or an Integer to an Enum.

newObject.name: newObject
newObject.description: Create a new object of the given type

merge.name: merge
merge.description: Merges the give domain object with its persistent state, i.e. it fills in all the missing null values

context.name: context
context.description: The current cursor context or transition context.

model.name: model
model.description: A reference to the current model

catch.name: catch
catch.description: Allows to declare a sub action sequence to execute as rejection handler

vars.name: vars
vars.description: In a component expression, the current vars of the component

fieldId.name: fieldId
fieldId.description: Returns the correct field id for fields in iterative contexts

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Helper function that will debug log its arguments and return the first argument

lazyDependency.name: lazyDependency
lazyDependency.description: Marks first the expression argument as being lazily evaluated in terms of context dependency updates.The user can change the context variables within without it triggering view updates.

query.name: query
query.description: Query embedded in a server-side expression

isAdmin.name: isAdmin
isAdmin.description: Checks if the current user has the admin role. Same as hasRole('ROLE_ADMIN').

isNew.name: isNew
isNew.description: Checks if the given domain object is new i.e. has a null identity

uri.name: uri
uri.description: Inner-application URI function, takes a template and map of template values as arguments

i18n.name: i18n
i18n.description: First argument is the translation tag followed by values for its placeholders

transition.name: transition
transition.description: An action that executes the given transition

props.name: props
props.description: In a component expression, the props/attributes of the component (e.g. props.name)

fork.name: fork
fork.description: Special action function that takes multiple sequences as input, runs them in parallel and waits for all of them to end.

hasRole.name: hasRole
hasRole.description: Checks if the current user has the given role.
